sourcesContent:
<form (ngSubmit)="onSubmit()" #form="ngForm" class="space-y-4">
  <label>Name:</label>
  <input [(ngModel)]="user.name" name="name" required />

  <label>Email:</label>
  <input [(ngModel)]="user.email" name="email" required />

  <button type="submit" [disabled]="form.invalid">{{ user.id ? 'Update' : 'Create' }} User</button>
  <button type="button" (click)="onCancel()">Cancel</button>
</form>
